Text: No, this isn't compeletely complete, here is a torrent that includes all the issues plus the 12 tie-ins - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6355177/Brightest_Day_-_Complete___12_Tie-Ins_by_Ridge87701
It's definitely the complete collection of the 25 issues of brightest day (including issue 0), but no, it doesn't include the tie ins.
